title: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman leaves for US to attend World Bank, IMF meetings - Times of India
content: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman leaves for US to attend World Bank, IMF meetings  Times of India
description: India Business News: NEW DELHI: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman left for the US late on Sunday to attend the spring meetings of the World Bank and the IMF as well as G.
